name: Warhammer: Mark of Chaos - Battle March
name_original: Warhammer: Mark of Chaos - Battle March
description:
Warhammer: Mark of Chaos - Battle March is a strategy game developed by Black Hole Entertainment. It came out on 16-05-2008. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Warhammer: Mark of Chaos - Battle March on PC and Xbox 360.
Jeremy Soule scored the game.
